title: Episode #20--Daniel Markey on U.S.-Pakistan Relations and the Haqqani Network
itunes:title: Episode #20--Daniel Markey on U.S.-Pakistan Relations and the Haqqani Network
itunes:subtitle: Ritika Singh interviews Council on Foreign Relations Senior Fellow Daniel Markey on U.S.-Pakistan Relations, tensions over drone strikes, and the rise of the Haqqani Network.
description:
Ritika Singh interviews Council on Foreign Relations Senior Fellow Daniel Markey on U.S.-Pakistan Relations, tensions over drone strikes, and the rise of the Haqqani Network.
